Command.name: help
Command.description:
RTConsole version 1.0.0, Unity release These commands are defined internally. Type 'help' to see this list. Type 'help name' to find out more information about the command 'name'.
A start (*) next to a name/flag means that the next parameter is needed by it.

Command.name: filter
Command.description: Used to apply/remove a filter to all messages with a certain tag. Only new messages will be affected by the filter

flags.flag: Used to specify which message tag will be used
Used to turn on/off the specified tag
